article_title: Job seekers more influenced by duties than pay
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

When it comes to jobs, employees are now more enticed by the work than the pay.

According to a new survey report by ManpowerGroup Solutions, people are now considering actual job duties as more important than the role’s compensation.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Erin Moriarty-Siler
article_metadata.description: The desire to feel fulfilled is one thing job seekers prefer over a raise.
